skill.name: scientific-slides
skill.description: Build slide decks and presentations for research talks. Use this for making PowerPoint slides, conference presentations, seminar talks, research presentations, thesis defense slides, or any scientific talk. Provides slide structure, design templates, timing guidance, and visual validation. Works with PowerPoint and LaTeX Beamer.
skill.summary: Build slide decks and presentations for research talks. Use this for making PowerPoint slides, confe...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: All 1288 static findings are false positives. The skill is a legitimate scientific presentation tool. Scanner misinterpreted LaTeX packages as crypto algorithms, markdown code blocks as Ruby execution, and hex color codes as C2 indicators. Python network calls to OpenRouter API are expected AI functionality with proper credential handling.

content.value_statement: Build professional scientific presentations for conferences, seminars, and thesis defenses. Generate AI-powered slides with consistent formatting, use LaTeX Beamer templates, and follow research-backed design principles.
actual_capabilities: Generate AI-powered slide images using OpenRouter API with consistent formatting
Create LaTeX Beamer presentations for academic conferences
Build PowerPoint slides using design templates and color guidelines
Validate presentations for slide count, duration, and format compliance
limitations: Requires OpenRouter API key for AI slide generation
Does not create presentations without user-provided content and structure
Visual validation requires human review for scientific accuracy

use_cases.title: Conference Presentations
use_cases.description: Create professional conference talks with AI-generated visuals and consistent formatting across all slides.

use_cases.title: Thesis Defense Slides
use_cases.description: Build polished defense presentations using Beamer templates and LaTeX for academic rigor.

use_cases.title: Seminar and Workshop Materials
use_cases.description: Design engaging seminar presentations with research citations and data visualization guidance.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Slide
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a presentation slide titled '[Slide Title]'. Key points: [list 3-4 points]. Format: [color scheme], professional design, minimal text.

prompt_templates.title: Results Slide
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a results slide titled '[Title]'. Present attached figure with key findings: [findings]. Citations: [references]. Match previous slide style.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Slide Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate [N] slides for [topic]. Slide 1: Title. Slides 2-[N-1]: Content sections. Slide [N]: Summary. Include citations. Consistent formatting throughout.

prompt_templates.title: Template Customization
prompt_templates.prompt: Create LaTeX Beamer presentation with theme: [theme name], colors: [RGB values], include: [sections]. Use [citation style] for references.

output_examples.input: Generate a 5-slide introduction to machine learning presentation
output: Slide 1: Title slide with ML topic and speaker info
Slide 2: Why ML matters with industry icons
Slide 3: Three types of learning diagram
Slide 4: Key applications in healthcare and finance

output_examples.input: Create a thesis defense title slide with university colors
Design a conference slide showing results comparison

best_practices: Define formatting goals at the start and use consistent colors, fonts, and layout across all slides
Attach previous slides when generating subsequent ones to maintain visual continuity
Include research citations in prompts for credibility and academic rigor
anti_patterns: Avoid text-heavy slides with paragraphs of content instead of bullet points
Do not use default PowerPoint themes without customization
Avoid inconsistent formatting between slides in the same presentation

faq.question: What API key do I need?
faq.answer: You need an OpenRouter API key for AI slide generation. Get it from openrouter.ai/keys.

faq.question: Can I use this offline?
faq.answer: AI generation requires API access. You can use LaTeX Beamer templates locally without an API key.

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: The skill supports PDF output from AI slides and LaTeX Beamer, plus PowerPoint (.pptx) files.

faq.question: How many slides per minute?
faq.description: Recommended ratio is 1 slide per minute for standard pace, with 2-3 minutes for complex slides.

faq.question: Does this create content?
faq.answer: No. You provide the content, structure, and citations. The skill generates visuals and formats slides.

faq.question: Can I use my own colors?
faq.answer: Yes. Define your color scheme in the FORMATTING GOAL section of each prompt using hex codes.
